articles.author: David Hambling
articles.title: Drone War Over Ukraine Is A High Speed Technology Arms Race - Forbes
articles.description: Ukraine is blinding Russia's long-range strike capability by knocking down its scout drones with FPV interceptors. It is a fast moving technology contest for high stakes.
articles.content:
Video from an FPV interceptor seconds before it brought down this Russian ZALA scout drone
Wild Hornets
There are few manned jets flying over Ukraine, but an air war is being fought out with a huge… [+7824 chars]
